Articles.Content: I searched the forums and couldn't find this requested before - how hard would it be to put a luminosity slider on lighting parts? I ask because sometimes you need lighting, but not necessarily *all* the lighting, that a light provides. Plus, in combination lights quickly wash everything out and actually make seeing detail harder, not easier. Just a thought.

You can kind of do this already by adjusting the RGB value of the light. A light that's set to 0.5, 0.5, 0.5 will be half as bright as one set to 1.0, 1.0, 1.0. It leaves a lot to be desired, but it basically works.

Use TweakableEverything, set the RGB values lower to get less of that "color", if you set all lower, you have a less bright "white" light.
